attributes.action: Extend the current help to buy scheme under its current form past March 2021
attributes.additional_details: Due to the impact of the coronavirus lockdown and the rising redundancy rate since May 2020 many people have had to cancel and back out of there property purchases under this scheme and now have no time remaining to re start there house purchase. This will effect the housing and building industry and cause thousands of people to not be able to get on or back on the housing ladder
attributes.background: Currently the help to buy scheme will end March 2021 which will see previous hone owners no longer qualify. We would like to see the current version of the extended 12 months under the same criteria till March 2022

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331592
